metadata.description: Rules for changes in XML file (e.g. pom.xml) to run on Apache Camel 3

hint.title: `org.apache.camel:camel-linkedin` artifact has been removed
hint.message: `org.apache.camel:camel-linkedin` artifact has been removed in Apache Camel 3 so it won't be available

hint.title: `org.apache.camel:camel-script` artifact has been removed
hint.message: `org.apache.camel:camel-script` artifact has been deprecated in Apache Camel 2 and removed in Apache Camel 3 as there is no support for javax.script, which is also deprecated in the JDK and to be removed from Java 11 onwards.

hint.title: `org.apache.camel:camel-jibx` artifact has been removed
hint.message: `org.apache.camel:camel-jibx` artifact has been deprecated in Apache Camel 2 and removed in Apache Camel 3 because it did not support JDK8.

hint.title: `org.apache.camel:camel-boon` artifact has been removed
hint.message: `org.apache.camel:camel-boon` artifact has been deprecated in Apache Camel 2 and removed in Apache Camel 3 because it did not support JDK9 and later.

hint.title: `twitter-streaming` component has been removed
hint.message: `twitter-streaming` component has been deprecated in Apache Camel 2 and removed in Apache Camel 3 because it relied on the deprecated Twitter Streaming API and is no longer functional.

hint.title: `org.apache.camel:camel-aws` artifact has been split up into multiple components
hint.message: `org.apache.camel:camel-aws` artifact has been split up into multiple components. So youâ€™ll have to add explicitly the dependencies for these components. From the OSGi perspective, there is still a `camel-aws` Karaf feature, which includes all the components features.
